H0.text: What consumer electronics product shares its name with the common name of the fruit Rubus Fructicosis. BlackBerry

H1.text: What consumer electronics product shares its name with the common name of the fruit Rubus Fructicosis. Raspberry

H2.text: What consumer electronics product shares its name with the common name of the fruit Rubus Fructicosis. Logan

H3.text: What consumer electronics product shares its name with the common name of the fruit Rubus Fructicosis. Eubatus

A4.text: The name BlackBerry was coined by the marketing company Lexicon Branding. The name was chosen out of about 40 potential names, because of the resemblance of the keyboard's buttons to that of the drupelets that compose the blackberry fruit.
